FrmAndLnRfrncDsc: Form 990, Schedule G, Part II, Fundraising Events
ExplntnTxt: The Women & Science program is an important outreach and fundraising initiative of The Rockefeller University. Comprised of a wide circle of friends and benefactors, Women & Science provides support for education and career advancement of scientists in biomedical research and related fields. One component of this initiative is the annual Women & Science Lecture and Luncheon.

FrmAndLnRfrncDsc: Form 990, Schedule G, Part II, Fundraising Events
ExplntnTxt: The Parents & Science program is an important outreach and fundraising initiative of The Rockefeller University. Parents & Science sponsors events that feature distinguished Rockefeller University scientists and eminent guest speakers from such fields as psychology, medicine, education, and the social sciences. A major focus is emerging discoveries and biomedical breakthroughs that are improving the health and well-being of children. Two components of this initiative are the annual Celebrating Science Benefit and Science Saturday, a community building event which enables parents to bring their children to the University. The "Other Events" listed in Column C in Part II is the Parents and Science Saturday program.
